metadata.description: location - should be the same as above
Username for the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Password for the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Name for FortiGate virtual appliance.
Virtual Machine size selection
Identifies whether to use new or previously created Storage Account
Unique Name for the Storage Account where the Virtual Machine's disks will be placed. Note, when deploying a custom template, Azure doesn't check these values for uniqueness.
Resource Group containing storage account - or new resource group from above (if new storage account)
Storage Account Type.
Identify whether to use a public IP and if so whether it is new or previously created
Name of Public IP address resource.
Unique DNS Prefix for the Public IP used to access the Virtual Machine.
Type of public IP address - A 'dynamic' address will change during reboot or periods of inactivity
Resource Group containing the public IP - or new resource group from above (if new public IP)
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Name of the Azure virtual network.
Resource Group containing the virtual network - or new resource group from above (if new vnet)
Virtual network address space in CIDR notation
Subnet 1 Name
Subnet 1 Prefix in CIDR notation (if using public IP, this will be the 'WAN' or external port)

Static IP from subnet 1 for port1 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.  Remember Azure reserves the first 3 IPs in each subnet.  When using an exising vnet, verify that this address is not already assigned.
Subnet 2 Name
Subnet 2 Prefix
Static IP from subnet 2 for port2 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Subnet 3 Name
Subnet 3 Prefix
Static IP from subne 3 for port3 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Subnet 4 Name
Subnet 4 Prefix
Static IP from subnet 4 for port4 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Subnet 5 Name
Subnet 5 Prefix
Static IP from subnet 5 for port5 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Subnet 6 Name
Subnet 6 Prefix
Static IP from subnet 6 for port6 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Subnet 7 Name
Subnet 7 Prefix
Static IP from subnet 7 for port7 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Subnet 8 Name
Subnet 8 Prefix
Static IP from subnet 8 for port8 of the FortiGate virtual appliance.
Base URL of the solution template gallery package
